name: Prevo
description: Nutrition and Rewards Program For Kids
overview:
Online Nutrition and Rewards Program for Kids

An on-line nutrition and rewards program. The program is a scientifically proven online point-based rewards program for children that educates, communicates and motivates children and their parents to eat healthy. The program uses sophisticated behavior models supported by an online incentive program to achieve meaningful change to modify behavior to form healthy habits. The program offers recommended and customized rewards to children in exchange for vital eating and exercising behaviors.
